Introduction

Lee Hi is a South Korean singer under duover. She was one half of the duo Hi Suhyun, a former member of the cancelled girl group SuPearls and a member of the disbanded girl duo BOM&HI.

She is best known for being the second place runner-up of the reality survival show K-pop Star 1 in 2011 and was subsequently signed to YG Entertainment. On December 31, 2019, she announced her departure from YG Entertainment. On July 23, 2020, she was introduced as a new artist of AOMG. On March 28, 2024, AOMG announced her departure from the agency after her contract expired.

On September 23, newly established agency duover announced she had signed an exclusive contract with them.
